```{r}
url <- "https://www.baseball-reference.com/awards/awards_2022.shtml#AL_MVP_voting_link"

robotstxt::paths_allowed(url)

mlb <- read_html(url)

".left .right"

  html_text()

html_nodes(mlb, css = ".right")[2:29] |>
  html_text()
```
